title: Bonus Episode # 8 – "Stoned Unturned" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this bonus episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark (http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/category/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/) , we bring you two terrifying tales from authors K.E. Moore and Matt Dymerski, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry (http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/) , about fearsome formations and mental maladies



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
